author: kossak
title: Type C Europlug pins
review:
At the time of writing, this ships with Europlug pins, so you will also need a travel adapter to use it outside of Europe.  Something to be aware of!

Not too much of a drama, but it would have been nice if LEGO made mention of it somewhere on their own webpage.

This is designed to be used with 8878 Rechargeable Battery Box.

author: ekimai
title: UK Adapter supplied
review:
I was concerned when reading reviews of this adapter.  Both on Brickset and other sites people have reported receiving a European plug, rather than one for their own country.

I'm pleased to say that mine arrived with a UK plug.  

[From this you can gather that I live in the UK!]

author: av8r1973
title: Not much to say - it works!
review:
Necessary to power the rechargeable battery box used in my trains, this little adapter does a great job at keeping power in it.  Though it's not likely manufactured by LEGO, the unit worked the first time out of the box and continues to keep my Maersk yard running.

I am contemplating buying more battery boxes to use with the other trains and a single charger will be nice.
